Installing in a nonstandard location

If you wish to install this Developer's Kit distribution in a directory other than the default, `/usr/cygnus', use the `-installdir' option to Install. Remember, though, you must set some environment variables in order for the tools to function at all. See section Running the programs. 

eg$ cd /tmp
eg$ tar xvf device Install
Install
eg$ ./Install -tape=device -installdir=somewhere bin
...

Go to the first, previous, next, last section, table of contents.
